desc: Independent mobile sewing machine repairs and servicing in Bristol, Bath, Somerset, Dorset, Devon, Oxfordshire, Gloucestershire and South Wales. Specialists in new industrial sewing machine sales including leather sewing machines, walking feet industrial sewing machines and stockists of Juki, Jack and Seiko.
